definitions.definition: Someone who identifies with or as an animal character with human-like characteristics (an anthropomorphic animal character).
An anthropomorphic animal character of this kind.
examples: What percentage of furries are wolves?

definitions.definition: Any member of the furry fandom or subculture (including those without fursonas ).
examples: The furry had designed an elaborate costume.

main_definition: Someone who identifies with or as an animal character with human-like characteristics (an anthropomorphic animal character).
secondary_definitions: An anthropomorphic animal character of this kind.
Any member of the furry fandom or subculture (including those without fursonas ).
